backend/main.mo: Defines core data types, maps, and activity logging for users, news, schemes, jobs, media, notifications, and settings with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten short descriptions summarizing many frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme variables and dark mode definitions applied across the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main client-side router using internal state to switch between home, login, dashboard, and admin pages.
frontend/src/assets/generatedAssets.ts: Exports static asset paths for logo and background images.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Displays an access-denied message for non-admin users with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAuthE: Renders an admin-auth failure screen with error details, retry, and home navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminModul: Routes the admin dashboard to the correct module view based on the active module key.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin routes by checking identity and role, showing loading, error, or access-denied states as needed.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/Adm: Generic searchable table component showing rows via column accessors with empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/Del: Reusable confirmation dialog for destructive actions with loading state.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/For: Small component displaying a validation error message with an icon.
frontend/src/components/admin/jobs/JobFo: Form for creating or updating jobs with validation, mutation handling, and BigInt timestamp conversion.
frontend/src/components/admin/jobs/JobsL: Displays all jobs with search, edit, and delete actions using a data table and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/media/Medi: Lists media files with search, previews, delete actions, and loading skeletons.
Dialog for previewing media items, supporting images, PDFs, and downloads.
Card for uploading media files with type validation and upload mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Ba: Page showing backup download tools and tabs for activity logs and login history.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Da: Displays dashboard stats for users, news, schemes, and jobs with refresh capability and a recent activity note.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Jo: Provides job management with list view and modal for creating or editing jobs.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Me: Shows media library with upload card and list of uploaded items.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Ne: Manages news articles with list view and dialog for creating or editing news.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/No: Offers tabs for composing notifications and viewing notification history.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Re: Displays reports dashboard for analytics and data export.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Sc: Manages government schemes with list view and dialog for creating or editing schemes.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Us: Handles user management including list, creation/editing dialog, and user details drawer.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/We: Provides website settings form with loading state and logo picker dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/news/NewsF: Form for creating or updating news articles with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/news/NewsL: Displays searchable news table with edit, publish, and delete actions plus confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/notificati: Form UI for composing notifications, selecting recipients, and submitting via createNotification hook with validation.
Displays a table of past notifications with message, recipient count, and timestamp, using notifications history data.
frontend/src/components/admin/reports/Re: Dashboard showing user/news stats and buttons to export users and news as CSV files.
frontend/src/components/admin/schemes/Sc: Form for creating or updating a scheme with validation and submission to create/update hooks.
Lists schemes with search, edit, and delete options using a data table and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/A: Shows all admin activity logs in a table with timestamps, principals, types, and details.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/B: Card with a button to trigger system data backup export using exportBackup hook.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/L: Displays filtered login/logout activities from admin logs in a table format.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/L: Dialog for selecting and saving a logo from available image media using website settings update API.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/W: Form to edit website settings like name, tagline, contact info, SEO fields, and open the logo picker.
frontend/src/components/admin/users/User: Drawer that displays full user details with role, status, and edit option.
Dialog for creating or editing a user with validation and save actions.
User list table with search, view, edit, and status toggle controls.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Error boundary that shows a fallback UI with reload option and error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginFooter: Footer for login pages with simple navigation buttons and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/auth/MemberLogin: UI-only login card with mobile, OTP, password, and remember-me options that navigates to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Main dashboard layout managing navbar, sidebar, mobile toggles, and routing between user and admin content.
Displays welcome info, profile completion, quick overview cards, and recent activity items.
Top navbar with search, notifications, user menu, and logout handling based on identity and role.
Right-side panel showing quick links and a list of announcements with priorities.
Sidebar navigation listing user or admin menu items with active highlighting and mobile support.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Button that opens notifications and shows an unread count badge.
A sliding notification panel that displays, marks, and clears notifications with overlay and keyboard handling.
Error boundary that suppresses rendering errors for the notification panel and logs them.
frontend/src/components/site/BrandLogo.t: Renders the brand image logo with size variants and a fallback placeholder if loading fails.
Footer displaying branding, support email, copyright text, and a referral link.
Page layout wrapper providing main content area and a footer.
frontend/src/components/site/TextLogo.ts: Text-based logo component with size and color variants.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/jobs.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on jobs via the backend actor and auto-invalidating job queries.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/media.ts: Hooks for fetching, uploading, and deleting media items, including file-to-blob conversion.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/news.ts: Hooks managing news CRUD and publish actions, refreshing news queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/notifications.t: Hooks for creating admin notifications and fetching placeholder notification history.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/schemes.ts: Hooks providing CRUD operations for schemes with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/security.ts: Hooks to fetch sorted admin activity logs and export backups as downloadable JSON files.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/settings.ts: Hooks to load and update website settings identified by a fixed settings ID.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminAuth.ts: Hooks checking the caller’s role and admin status using backend actor queries.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/users.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on users via the backend actor, with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useExampleNotificatio: Implements a local notifications system with sample data and helpers for dismissing, clearing, and marking notifications read.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity authentication state, loading stored identities, and exposing login and clear methods through context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing for future query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, and utility classes for light/dark modes and visual effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard within a route guard using the dashboard layout.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Provides an Internet Identity–based admin login screen with error handling and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the home page with hero content, category sections, and notification panel integration.
frontend/src/pages/MemberLoginPage.tsx: Renders the member login page with a background image, branding, login card, and footer, handling fallback when the background fails to load.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboardPage.tsx: Wraps the user dashboard layout component and passes navigation props with non-admin mode enabled.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/userRole.ts: Defines utilities for checking admin roles and converting user role enums into readable labels.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, scope, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the Smart Janghai application.
